mapper.select: SELECT food_expense, living_expense, housing_communication_expense, finance_expense, transportation_expense, childcare_expense, leisure_culture_expense, pet_expense, event_gift_expense FROM Budget WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM BudgetTransaction WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND transaction_type = 'expense' AND DATE_FORMAT(transaction_datetime, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m')) AS lastMonthExpense,
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM BudgetTransaction WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND transaction_type = 'expense' AND DATE_FORMAT(transaction_datetime, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) AS thisMonthExpense,
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM BudgetTransaction WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND transaction_type = 'expense' AND WEEK(transaction_datetime, 1) = WEEK(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK), 1)) AS lastWeekExpense,
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM BudgetTransaction WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND transaction_type = 'expense' AND WEEK(transaction_datetime, 1) = WEEK(NOW(), 1)) AS thisWeekExpense

SELECT month_budget, (food_expense + living_expense + housing_communication_expense + finance_expense + transportation_expense + childcare_expense + leisure_culture_expense + pet_expense + event_gift_expense) AS thisMonthExpense FROM Budget WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
